Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.utils

This package contains various utilities. The utilities are usually implemented as package private classes and their functionality is exposed through static utility classes:
See Also:
ExprUtils, PathUtils, StmtUtils, TypeUtils

    Utility functions related to expressions.
    FpUtils  
    IndexedVars
    Represents an immutable mapping, where each integer index can be associated with a set of variables.

    Helper class for building a new instance.

    Utility functions related to paths.

    Utility functions related to types.
